channel.title: Character saving
channel.description:
hey guys, can you help me character saving please? I don't even no where to start, just something tht saves the chars location, and, well everything like levels and items (automatic) Also a manual command they could use ::savechar.
Cheers! ~Johno

item.title: Character saving
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Oh, lol cuz im in dev stages n i use 2 sources (1 has coords) The one dev to make sure it looks good. When i change source without logging out it doesn’t save, so i was wondering if i cud make it save EVERY file, every 5 mins?

Read full topic

The characters should be saved automatlicy when you saftly log out, doesn’t they?
